channel.title: Macro on LiaScript
channel.description: Recent content in Macro on LiaScript

item.title: A Custom Extension for Algebra
item.description: Today we show how to build a custom extension for executable code-snippets for LiaScript #Markdown by using the computer algebra systems Algebrite.

item.title: Macros
item.description: How can you define custom macros or even define reusable LiaScript libraries?
